But on this occasion, Afghanistan was debated and harsh questions were asked- namely, Has the West Failed in Afghanistan? This was an implicit riposte, almost ten years later, to Donald Rumsfeld 's optimistic claim of successful American interventionism. Google Inc( GOOG) wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview.
